means: 趾高气扬( mighty的最高级 )

sentence.Network_en: " If thou fearest to leave me in our cottage, thou mightiest take me along with thee.
sentence.Network_cn: “ 要是你害怕把我一个人留在咱们的小屋里, 你可以带我一块儿去那儿嘛.

sentence.Network_en: Silent though is, after all, the mightiest agent in human affairs.
sentence.Network_cn: 确实,沉默毕竟是人类事件中最强大的代理人.

sentence.Network_en: Our mightiest feelings are always those which remain most unspoken.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们最强烈的感情总是那些最缄默的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Silent though is , after all , the mightiest agent in human affairs ., 确实 , 沉默毕竟是人类事件中最强大的代理人.
mightiest affection is that you remain unspoken ., 最强烈的感情是你默默的爱心.
What if mightiest word is love , love beyond marital , filial , national., 如果最崇高的词是爱 , 那么爱超越了婚姻 , 亲子 , 民族.

list.abs: its blossoms have the mightiest power ., 它的花朵拥有非凡的力量.

what if the mightiest word is love , love beyond marital , filial , national . love that casts a widening pool of light . love with no need to preempt grievance .如果最崇高的词是爱，那么爱超越了婚姻、亲子、民族。爱投射出扩大的光圈。爱无怨尤。
What if mightiest word is love , love beyond marital , filial , national., 如果最崇高的词是爱 , 那么爱超越了婚姻 , 亲子 , 民族.
our mightiest feelings are always those which remain most unspoken.-Kingsley , Charles我们最强烈的感情总是那些最缄默的。--金斯利
now the giant , thundering beasts serve as the Lich King mightiest warriors and the guardians of the Scourge's holdings in Northrend .现在这些巨大的猛兽作为最凶悍的战士效力于巫妖王手下，并充天灾军团在诺森德领地的护卫者。

entry.tran: 强大的;强有力的;巨大的
entry.def: Mighty is used to describe something that is very large or powerful.

example.ex: There was a flash and a mighty bang.
example.tran: 一道闪光和一声巨响接踵而至。

example.ex: ...a land marked with vast lakes and mighty rivers.
example.tran: 一片拥有大片湖泊和宽广河流的土地

entry.tran: (置于形容词和副词之前表示强调)很，非常，十分
entry.def: Mighty is used in front of adjectives and adverbs to emphasize the quality that they are describing.

example.ex: It's something you'll be mighty proud of...
example.tran: 这是你们将会非常引以为豪的事情。

example.ex: Being paper money, it rotted away mighty fast.
example.tran: 由于是纸币，所以烂得很快。

auth_sentence.content: Even the world's mightiest military alliance is not immune from these problems.
auth_sentence.res_content: Even the world's mightiest military alliance is not immune from these problems.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Even the world's mightiest military alliance is not immune from these problems.

auth_sentence.content: London's mightiest lung has seldom seen such a large and passionate crowd.
auth_sentence.res_content: London's mightiest lung has seldom seen such a large and passionate crowd.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: London's mightiest lung has seldom seen such a large and passionate crowd.

auth_sentence.content: Sometimes, the courage of a single individual can shake the mightiest of nations.
auth_sentence.res_content: Sometimes, the courage of a single individual can shake the mightiest of nations.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sometimes, the courage of a single individual can shake the mightiest of nations.
